db:abstract.db:para: Testing the available audio devices and their configuration.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = audiodevices
QT += multimedia
HEADERS = audiodevices.h
SOURCES = audiodevices.cpp \ main.cpp
FORMS += audiodevicesbase.ui
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/multimedia/audiodevices INSTALLS += target
QT+=widgets
